title: No Limits
description: GAY BDSM. After being dumped by his alpha jock boyfriend, 22-year-old Jesse Ryan was taken by a new hardcore master. In this second book, Jesse's new master first rebuilds the boy's body into that of the perfect slave. Now, the sadist is going to use any means necessary to reshape young Jesse's mind. By the end, Jesse understands what it means to be a no limits sub.
author: S.F. Tanner
